meanings.definition: To lift or raise to a higher position again.
meanings.sent1: She carefully reelevates the picture frame on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The crane operator reelevates the heavy load to the top floor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat reelevates the toy mouse just out of reach.
meanings.sent4: His kindness reelevates the spirits of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The sun's warmth reelevates my mood on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To promote or advance to a higher level again.
meanings.sent1: The teacher reelevates the student to the next grade level.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and dedication can reelevate your career to new heights.
meanings.sent3: The magician reelevates the rabbit to the position of chief entertainer.
meanings.sent4: Her success story reelevates the importance of perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song reelevates my emotions to a state of bliss.
